title: I cant join a game!!!
body: After champ select the loading screen was about to come up but nothing happened. i restarted twice but it shows me the reconnect screen. after i press reconnect all it does is minimise league but nothing else happens. please help!!! i feel really bad because now my team is gonna have to play 4v5 the whole game

replies.body:
Hi Ghazan

Sucks to hear you're having this issue - how long has it been happening for?

What ISP are you with?  Can you run a trace route to 103.240.227.1?

Cheers
Mindstar

It has happened since yesterday it was fine until then (I even played a couple of games that were fine after the patch) but I joined a normal game and it randomly begun. I've tested it with several custom games and none have loaded so far. 

My ISP is Orcon 

I had to look up how to do the traceroute thing just now and after it finished the trace I searched for 103.240.227.1 but nothing appeared although I'm not sure what that means

ps thanks for helping me!! its frustrating cus one for all looks fun and I cant play it yet

I have the exact same problem... And looking over the forums its been happening to people for years. However it doesn't seem Riot employees actually give a shit about this issue or how terrible their client is. If you find a solution let me know until then I'm just going to play other things.
im gonna contact the support team hopefully they can help me
